name: White Crew Neck T-Shirt
size: S / M / L / XL / XXL (Please refer to size chart for best fit)
description: Elevate your everyday look with our White Crew Neck T-Shirt – a wardrobe essential designed for maximum comfort and effortless style. Made from soft, breathable fabric, this tee is perfect for casual days, work-from-home setups, or layering under jackets and outerwear. Clean, minimal, and versatile – just the way a perfect t-shirt should be.
keyfeatures:
Color: Classic White

Fit: Regular / Oversized (depending on your style)

Neckline: Crew Neck

Fabric: 100% Cotton / Premium Cotton Blend

Soft & breathable – perfect for all-day wear
Medium thickness – not too light, not too heavy
Machine washable – easy to care for, made for daily use

name: Plaid Button-Up Shirt
size: S / M / L / XL / XXL (Please refer to the size chart for accurate fit)
description: Stay stylish with this classic plaid shirt – a timeless wardrobe essential made from soft, breathable fabric. Whether you're dressing for work, a weekend outing, or layering up for a casual look, this shirt offers the perfect blend of comfort and style. Suitable for both men and women.
keyfeatures:
Classic Plaid Pattern: A bold yet timeless design that adds personality to your outfit.

Comfortable Fit (Regular / Loose): Designed to suit all body types – wear it tucked or untucked.

Soft & Breathable Fabric: Ensures all-day comfort and prevents overheating.

Full Button-Down Front & Long Sleeves: Versatile styling options – wear it closed or layer over a t-shirt.

Perfect for Any Occasion: Casual days, work, travel, or layering for streetwear looks.

Easy Care: Machine washable, fade-resistant, holds shape after wash.

name: Skinny Jeans
size: 28 / 30 / 32 / 34 / 36 / 38 (Refer to the size chart for best fit)
description: Step up your style with our classic skinny jeans – designed to fit close to the body for a sleek and modern look. Made from high-quality denim with a touch of stretch, these jeans offer comfort and style in one. Perfect for daily wear, work, or a casual night out.
keyfeatures:
Slim, Tapered Fit (Skinny Leg): Hugs your legs from thigh to ankle for a flattering silhouette.

Modern Design: Easily pairs with t-shirts, button-ups, or jackets for versatile styling.

Comfort Stretch Denim: Soft yet durable fabric with slight stretch for better movement.

Sturdy Zipper & Button Closure: Made to last, with smooth operation every time.

Functional Pockets (Front & Back): Practical and stylish with real usable pockets.

All-Occasion Wear: Great for work, weekends, or going out with friends.

name: Denim Jacket
size: S / M / L / XL / XXL (Please refer to our size chart for exact measurements and best fit.)
description: Upgrade your wardrobe with this classic denim jacket – a timeless essential that never goes out of style. Made from high-quality denim, it’s designed for comfort, durability, and effortless cool. Whether you're layering over a t-shirt, hoodie, or dress, this jacket adds a stylish touch to any outfit. Perfect for both men and women.
keyfeatures:
Premium Denim Fabric: Made from high-quality denim that’s strong, durable, and comfortable to wear all day.

Classic Design: Button-up front, pointed collar, and structured seams for a sleek, timeless silhouette.

Functional Pockets: Two chest flap pockets and two side pockets for added convenience.

Unisex Fit: Suitable for both men and women; available in Regular or Oversized styles to match your look.

Versatile Styling: Perfect for layering with t-shirts, shirts, hoodies, or dresses.

All-Season Wear: Great for spring, autumn, and even cool summer nights.

Easy Care: Machine washable; maintains shape and color after washes.

name: Long Pleated Skirt
size: Free Size / S / M / L / XL / XXL
description: Add elegance and movement to your wardrobe with this long pleated skirt – a flowy, feminine piece that offers both comfort and style. Made from lightweight fabric that drapes beautifully, this skirt is perfect for everyday wear or dressed-up occasions. Whether paired with a tucked-in blouse, a crop top, or a casual tee, it brings graceful flow and effortless charm to any look.
keyfeatures:
Elegant Pleated Design: Soft, defined pleats that flow beautifully with every step.

Lightweight & Breathable Fabric: Comfortable for all-day wear – perfect for warm or mild weather.

Elastic Waistband: Offers a secure, flexible fit that flatters your waist without feeling tight.

Versatile Styling: Matches well with heels, sneakers, sandals, or boots – dress it up or down easily.

Modest & Feminine Length: Long design offers full coverage with a graceful silhouette.

Ideal for Any Occasion: Casual outings, work, dates, brunch, or special events.

name: Chiffon Sleeveless Top
description: Light, elegant, and effortlessly chic – this chiffon sleeveless top is a must-have for warm weather or layered looks. Made from soft, breathable chiffon fabric, it offers a flowy silhouette that drapes beautifully on the body. Perfect for work, casual outings, or dressier occasions, this top adds a touch of feminine charm to any outfit.
keyfeatures:
Lightweight Chiffon Fabric: Soft, airy, and breathable – ideal for hot days or layering under blazers and cardigans.

Sleeveless Design: Keeps you cool while offering a sleek, polished appearance.

Flowy Fit: Drapes beautifully for a flattering, relaxed look.

Versatile Styling: Easily pairs with jeans, skirts, or tailored pants for both casual and dressy looks.

Available in Multiple Colors: (Add your available colors here – e.g. white, black, beige, pastel pink)

Perfect for Work or Weekend: Comfortable enough for daily wear, stylish enough for going out.

name: Black Fashion Hoodie
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this black fashion hoodie – the perfect blend of comfort and streetwear cool. Made from soft, high-quality fabric, it offers a relaxed fit with a trendy silhouette. Whether you're layering up for casual outings, workouts, or just lounging at home, this hoodie delivers both warmth and effortless style.
keyfeatures:
Premium Soft Fabric: Cozy, breathable, and durable – perfect for all-day wear.

Classic Hoodie Design: Adjustable drawstring hood and kangaroo front pocket for added functionality.

Trendy Fit: Slightly oversized or regular fit options available to suit your style.

Ribbed Cuffs and Hem: Keeps the warmth in and ensures a snug fit.

Versatile Black Color: Easily pairs with jeans, joggers, or shorts for any casual look.

Unisex Style: Designed to fit comfortably on both men and women.

Easy Care: Machine washable with colors that stay vibrant wash after wash.

name: Floral Dress
description: Bring a fresh, feminine touch to your wardrobe with this beautiful floral dress. Featuring a vibrant floral print and a flattering silhouette, this dress is perfect for casual outings, garden parties, or special occasions. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric, it offers comfort and style all day long.
keyfeatures:
Beautiful Floral Pattern: Eye-catching design that adds charm and elegance.

Lightweight & Breathable Fabric: Keeps you cool and comfortable throughout the day.

Flattering Fit: Designed to enhance your natural shape with a cinched waist or A-line cut.

Versatile Styling: Perfect for pairing with sandals, heels, or casual sneakers.

Suitable for Multiple Occasions: Casual wear, dates, parties, or vacations.

Easy Care: Machine washable, maintains color and shape after washing.

name: Men’s Navy Polo Shirt
description: Elevate your casual wardrobe with this classic men’s navy polo shirt. Made from soft, breathable fabric, it offers a comfortable fit that’s perfect for everyday wear, work, or weekend outings. The timeless design features a neat collar and button placket, combining style with versatility.
keyfeatures:
Premium Cotton Blend: Soft, breathable, and durable for all-day comfort.

Classic Polo Design: Ribbed collar and three-button placket for a polished look.

Tailored Fit: Provides a modern silhouette without sacrificing comfort.

Versatile Navy Color: Easy to pair with jeans, chinos, or shorts.

Durable Stitching: Ensures long-lasting wear and shape retention.

Easy Care: Machine washable, resistant to shrinking and fading.

name: Stretch Fabric Sweatpants
description: Experience ultimate comfort and flexibility with these stretch fabric sweatpants. Designed for active lifestyles and casual wear, these sweatpants feature a soft, stretchy material that moves with you. Perfect for workouts, lounging at home, or running errands, they combine practicality with a modern, sleek look.
keyfeatures:
High-Quality Stretch Fabric: Soft, breathable, and flexible for unrestricted movement.

Elastic Waistband with Drawstring: Adjustable fit for added comfort and security.

Tapered Leg Design: Offers a stylish, streamlined silhouette.

Functional Pockets: Convenient side pockets for essentials.

Durable Stitching: Built to withstand frequent wear and washing.

Versatile Use: Ideal for gym, outdoor activities, or casual everyday wear.
